subject: Warranty Claim â€“ HairDry Pro 1000 Heating Issue
body:
Hello Support Team,

I purchased the HairDry Pro 1000 (Model HDP-1000) about one month ago. Recently, the dryer powers on but does not produce warm air consistently. I have used it only for normal home use. Kindly advise on repair or replacement under warranty.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
Alex Smith
Phone: +1-555-001-1001
Email: alex.smith@gmail.com
